summary: Provides an integration that records Litellm request and response data into Google Cloud Storage buckets. Includes an asynchronous logger that formats log filenames, organizes folder hierarchy, batches writes, and optionally interacts with Vertex AI, as well as a base utility for constructing the necessary HTTP headers for GCS operations.
business_intent: Allow applications using Litellm to persist operational logs in a scalable, cloudâ€‘based storage solution for auditing, debugging, and downstream analysis, while supporting optional Vertex AI workflows.
